title: How to Download YouTube Videos as MP4: Safe & Easy Options

steps.title: Go to the video you want to convert.
steps.content: Go to the video you want to convert. Find the YouTube video that you want to download and convert in the mobile YouTube app or at YouTube.com . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Copy the video's URL.
steps.content: Copy the video's URL. If you're using a web browser, highlight and right-click (or control-click) the URL in the address bar and select Copy . If you're using the mobile app, tap the Share icon below the video and choose Copy link .

steps.title: Search Google for a free converter website.
steps.content: Search Google for a free converter website. Choose one of the many conversion sites. Search for "convert YouTube to MP4" and you'll find a lot of free sites willing to help you download a video as an MP4 file. Some of the most reputable options include OnlineVideoConverter , ClipConverter , and 4kdownload . You can use whatever site you want, but stay away from sites that have the following hallmarks of scams: Demanding personal information. Numerous pop-ups. You may want to use an ad blocker when using one of these websites. Payment requests (legit sites are free). Forced download of programs or converters. While there are programs you can download to get YouTube videos, you should never be forced into downloading anything other than your video when using an online converter.

steps.title: Paste the URL and choose "MP4."
steps.content: Paste the URL and choose "MP4." Once you find a converter, add the video's URL and set the conversion method to MP4 . Depending on the site, the method may already be set to MP4. Some websites won’t allow you to choose the format or quality until after the video is uploaded and processed. [2] X Research source The higher the quality, the bigger the file.

steps.title: Convert the video.
steps.content: Convert the video. Click Start or Convert. Make sure the button you are pressing is part of the site and not a pop-up. To be sure of this, make sure it looks exactly like the other buttons on the site, and hover over it with your mouse: you should see the website you're using appear as a URL at the bottom of your screen. Some sites require you to click another link labeled Download File . Some websites may give you instructions on how to open the video in a web browser and download the video file. Now that you have the video, you can watch it in any video player, whether you are online or not, and even transfer it to your phone or mobile device.

steps.title: Download and install 4K Video Downloader.
steps.content: Download and install 4K Video Downloader. 4K Video Downloader is a free, reliable, and safe program that is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux Ubuntu. To download it, go to the 4K Video Downloader download site , scroll down to where it says “4K Video Downloader” and click the download link for your operating system. Open the installation file in your Downloads folder and follow the prompts to install the program. Note that the download site also has “4K Video Downloader Plus” downloads at the top. This is the premium version that has additional features and a subscription fee. The free version is a little way down the page, and it will work just fine to convert YouTube videos to MP4.

steps.title: Copy the URL of the video you want to convert.
steps.content: Copy the URL of the video you want to convert. Open the video you want to download as an MP4 from YouTube, highlight the URL in the address bar, right-click it or control-click it, then click Copy. Alternatively, you can click Share at the bottom of the screen and click Copy next to the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Open 4K Video Downloader and click Smart Mode.
steps.content: Open 4K Video Downloader and click Smart Mode . It’s the icon with the light bulb at the top of the 4K Video Downloader app.

steps.title: Select “MP4” as the video format and click OK.
steps.content: Select “MP4” as the video format and click OK . You can also use the drop-down menu next to “Quality” to select the video quality you want to download. Selecting Best Quality will download the best available quality. If you want to download subtitles for the video, use the drop-down menu next to “Subtitles” to select what language you want to download subtitles in.

steps.title: Click Paste Link.
steps.content: Click Paste Link . It’s the icon with the plus (+) link at the top. This will automatically paste the link you copied from YouTube and download your video as an MP4 to your computer. You can find your video downloads in the “4K Video Downloader” folder in your Videos folder.

steps.title: Download and install MediaHuman Video Downloader.
steps.content: Download and install MediaHuman Video Downloader. MediaHuman Video Downloader is a program you can use to download videos from YouTube. It is a paid program, but it has a free trial that allows you to download 20 YouTube videos as MP4s. Use the following steps to download and install MediaHuman Video Downloader: Go to the MediaHuman download website in a web browser. Scroll down to the “Video Downloader” section. Click the download link for the version that is compatible with your operating system. Open the installation file in your Downloads folder. Follow the prompts to complete the installation.

steps.title: Copy the video's URL from YouTube.
steps.content: Copy the video's URL from YouTube. You can either highlight the URL in the address bar, right-click or control-click it and click Copy, or click Share at the bottom and click Copy .

steps.title: Open MediaHuman YouTube Downloader and ensure MP4 is the output format.
steps.content: Open MediaHuman YouTube Downloader and ensure MP4 is the output format. Click the app icon in the Windows Start menu or the Applications folder on a Mac to open the app. Once open, click Output Format at the top of the app and ensure “Enable MP4” is checked. Uncheck any other formats that you don’t want.

steps.title: Click Paste Link.
steps.content: Click Paste Link . It’s the icon that resembles a plus sign (+) inside of a circle at the top. This automatically pastes the link to the YouTube video you want to convert to MP4. MediaHuman YouTube Downloader will start processing the video.

steps.title: Select the video quality you want to download.
steps.content: Select the video quality you want to download. Once the video is done processing, click one of the options in the grey bar in the middle of the screen to select the resolution you want to download. The higher the resolution, the larger the file.

steps.title: Click the download button.
steps.content: Click the download button. It’s the button that has a circle with an arrow pointing down on the right. This will convert the YouTube video to an MP4 file and start the download to your computer. By default, MediaHuman YouTube Downloader will download your videos to the MediaHuman folder in your Downloads folder.
